/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are tall and modern, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and creating a lens flare in the image. The street itself is busy with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the greenery of the trees and the various hues of the buildings.
